sentences: Love was to star in an album originally titled I canChu♥ and a promotional music video from I canChu♥, but the release was changed to a single and titled "Love no Theme" before it was released on April 11, 2007.
Otsuka released a second single under Love titled "White Choco" on November 21, 2007.
On November 18, 2009, the debut mini-album of Love was released, titled Love It.
